message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: Please compare the growth trajectory of the leading global e-commerce platforms by compiling their quarterly performance for 2024—Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), Alibaba. Use figures from official financial reports for publicly traded companies; for privately held firms, cite reputable news sources and mark relevant numbers with an asterisk (*) to denote that they are estimates. For information you can't find online, just fill in with "-". 

Present the data in one Markdown table with the columns (in this order): Company, Quarter, GMV (USD bn), Revenue (USD bn), Net Profit (USD bn).

For Quarters,  label it simply Q1, Q2, etc.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

Assistant: 
<think>

To compare the growth trajectory of leading global e-commerce platforms like Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), and Alibaba, I'll search through their respective financial reports and news sources. I'll compile their quarterly performance for 2024. </think>
<search> amazon gmv q1 2024 </search>

Search query: amazon gmv q1 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://ir.aboutamazon.com/news-release/news-release-details/2024/Amazon.com-Announces-First-Quarter-Results-68b9258cd/):
Amazon.com Announces First Quarter Results (NASDAQ: AMZN) today announced financial results for its first quarter ended March 31, 2024. Net sales increased 13% to $143.3 billion in the ...

[Doc 2](https://s2.q4cdn.com/299287126/files/doc_financials/2025/ar/Amazon-2024-Annual-Report.pdf):
[PDF] Amazon's 2024 annual report In Q1 2024, we invested $2.75 billion in a second convertible note. In Q4 2024, we entered into an agreement and invested $1.3 billion in a ...

[Doc 3](https://variety.com/2024/digital/news/amazon-q1-2024-earnings-ad-revenue-prime-video-1235987171/):
Amazon Q1 Ad Revenue Leaps 24% to $11.8 Billion, Lifted by Prime ... Amazon raked in $11.82 billion in ad revenue for Q1 2024, up 24%, fueled by its launch of ads by default in Prime Video.

[Doc 4](https://futurumgroup.com/insights/amazon-q1-2024-financial-performance-a-deep-dive/):
Amazon Q1 2024 Financial Performance: A Deep Dive - Futurum In Q1 2024, AWS reported revenue of $25 billion, a significant figure that adds to the difficulty of achieving high growth percentages as ...

[Doc 5](https://www.digitalcommerce360.com/2024/05/01/amazon-sales-q1-2024-operating-income/):
Amazon grows sales in Q1 while more than tripling operating income Amazon sales rose about 13% in Q1 2024, but the online marketplace's operating income grew more than 3x year over year.
I'll move on to eBay, Shopee (Sea), and Alibaba. Let's find their quarterly performance data for 2024.

Search query: ebay q1 2024 gmv
Result: [Doc 1](https://investors.ebayinc.com/investor-news/press-release-details/2024/eBay-Inc.-Reports-First-Quarter-2024-Results/default.aspx):
eBay Inc. Reports First Quarter 2024 Results Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV) was $18.6 billion, up 1% on an as-reported basis and roughly flat on an FX-Neutral basis. GAAP net income from continuing ...

[PDF] Q1'24 eBay Earnings Presentation This presentation contains forward-looking statements relating to, among other things, the future performance of eBay Inc. and its consolidated ...

eBay revenue, GMV in Q1 via collectibles and fashion With that, eBay Q1 revenue grew year over year to $2.58 billion. That's up about 2% from $2.56 billion in 2024. Total eBay advertising ...

eBay Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV) 2018-2025 From $73.21 billion in 2023 it increased by 2% to $74.67 billion in 2024.

[Doc 5](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/ebay-ebay-q1-earnings-revenues-155000785.html):
eBay (EBAY) Q1 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Rise Y/Y eBay's (EBAY) first-quarter 2024 results benefit from strength in its advertising business ... EBAY's total GMV of $18.62 billion in the reported ...
